thread.title: North Korea could release American prisoners

title: North Korea could release American prisoners
text:
North Korea could release American prisoners Thursday, May 03, 2018 - 02:22
The White House said on Thursday it would welcome the release of three Americans imprisoned in North Korea as a goodwill gesture before a planned summit between U.S. President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un, but that it could not confirm reports that they are about to be freed. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
The White House said on Thursday it would welcome the release of three Americans imprisoned in North Korea as a goodwill gesture before a planned summit between U.S. President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un, but that it could not confirm reports that they are about to be freed.
